tag.description: Tags to add to the document. When tag array property is provided, tags that are in this array will be added. If tag is not provided or empty then no updates/inserts of tags will occur.

untag.description: Tags to remove from the document. When untag array property is provided, tags that are in this array will be removed from the document. If untag property is empty or not provided then no removal of tags will occur.

allOf.error_message: Invalid source ID: %. Not matching regex: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_:@=;!''%%-.()+,$*]+$

business_value.description: business value of the asset, should be a number of a scale 1 to 10

risk.description: risk related to the asset should be a number (float) from 1 - 10

allOf.error_message: Invalid risk value: %. Value must be between 0 and 10
